data.title: Bureau of Medical Cannabis Regulation Releases Proposed Regulations for Medical Cannabis Testing Laboratories
data.excerpt: The Bureau of Medical Cannabis Regulation (BMCR) today announced that its proposed testing laboratories regulations for medical cannabis have been posted and the 45-day public comment period is now underway.
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
